ingredients.content: 100 g milk chocolate, small pieces or callets
50 g dark chocolate, small pieces or callets
397 g liquid caramel (1 x 397 g tin)
100 g digestive biscuits, chocolate, broken in pieces

preparations.content: Place milk chocolate and dark chocolate in mixing bowl then grate <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place cream in mixing bowl and whip <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add caramel, 100 g reserved grated chocolate and peppermint extract then whip <b>15-20 sec/speed 4<b> until softly whipped. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>.

Cover bases of serving glasses with ⅓ caramel mixture. Sprinkle with ⅓ reserved grated chocolate and layer with half chocolate biscuits. Create further layers of ⅓ caramel mixture, ⅓ reserved grated chocolate and remaining chocolate biscuits. Finish with a final layer of caramel mixture and remaining grated chocolate.
Place parfaits in fridge for at least 2 hours to set. Serve chilled.
